      • migrateOfflineLists

        @Deprecated
public static int migrateOfflineLists(ListManager manager,
                                                  SgnDatabase db,
                                                  boolean delete)
        Deprecated. Shopping list are no longer maintained
        This method will migrate any Shoppinglist, and their ShoppinglistItem from the offline state, to the currently logged in User, and they will at a later point in time be synchronized to the ShopGun API.
        Parameters:
        manager - A ListManager
        db - A SgnDatabase
        delete - true if you want to have the offline Shoppinglist and ShoppinglistItem deleted on a successful migration completion, else false.
        Returns:
        the number of migrated lists

      • intToBool

        public static boolean intToBool(int i)
        SDK default mapping between int and boolean.

        returns i == 1 so 1 is true, and all else is false

        Parameters:
        i - The integer to convert
        Returns:
        A boolean value

      • unescape

        public static int unescape(boolean b)
        SDK default mapping between int and boolean.

        true returns 1, false returns 0;

        Parameters:
        b - The boolean to convert
        Returns:
        An integer

      • unescape

        public static java.lang.String unescape(java.lang.Boolean b)
        SDK default mapping between string and boolean.

        true returns 1, null and false returns 0;

        Parameters:
        b - The Boolean to convert
        Returns:
        A String
